name: 王聖銘
objective: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods in various domains.
schedule:
Week 01      Contexts, Strategies, and Value Creation
Week 02      Behaving and Experiencing
Week 03-04 Exploring and Analytic: Design by Data
Week 05-06 Visual Perception and Informatics Design
Week 07-08 Proposal for Innovation Service
Week 09       Midterm Speech
Week 10-11 Organizing for Service Innovation
Week 12-13 Human Insight, Envision and Expression
Week 13-14 Compassion and Design
Week 15-16 Social Connection and Sustainable Well-being Design
Week 17-18 Project and Proposal Presentation
scorePolicy:
Attendance 20％
Case Studies Report 30％
Lecture and Speech Report 20％
Term Project Proposal 30％
materials:
1. Melis Senova, This Human, How to be the person designing for other people, BIS Publishers, 2017
2. Lucy Kimbell, The Service Innovation Handbook, Action-oriented creative thinking toolkit for service organizations, BIS Publishers, 2014
remarks:
本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
